getLabel()[source]¶

Retrieve a passage and store it in the object :param reference: Reference of the passage :type reference: str :rtype: dict :returns: Dictionary with label informations

Retrieve a passage and store it in the object :param reference: Reference of the passage :type reference: str :rtype: Passage :returns: Object representing the passage

getValidReff(level=None)[source]¶

Given a resource, Text will compute valid reffs :param level: Depth required. If not set, should retrieve deeper level :type level: Int :rtype: List :returns: List of levels
